title: Make plugin_data optional and (not repeated)
body_html: Make plugin_data optional and (not repeated) …Every summary op writes data for a single plugin to process. Hence, each SummaryMetadata proto should have a single PluginData optional field (instead of a repeated one). This removes much complexity from TensorBoard logic that loops over the plugin data. It also simplifies the SQL schema - it can now enforce a one-to-one relationship between summary op and plugin.

body: Make plugin_data optional and (not repeated) …Every summary op writes data for a single plugin to process. Hence, each SummaryMetadata proto should have a single PluginData optional field (instead of a repeated one). This removes much complexity from TensorBoard logic that loops over the plugin data. It also simplifies the SQL schema - it can now enforce a one-to-one relationship between summary op and plugin.
